definition: to suck; causatively, to give milk
kjvTranslation: milch, nurse(-ing mother), (give, make to) suck(-ing child, -ling).

translations.bg: да смуча; в съчинително наклонение - да давам мляко
translations.da: at sutte; kausativt, at give mælk
translations.el: να πιπιλίζω- αιτιωδώς, να δίνω γάλα
translations.nb: å suge; kausativt, å gi melk
translations.ro: a suge; cauzal, a da lapte
translations.sv: att suga; kausativt, att ge mjölk
translations.zh: 吮吸；因果关系上是指给予乳汁
